song_lyrics: Jaḍbuddhi jīv po’chyānā parmāṇā avichaḷ āviyā,
Je mukta thayā vyāsmunie vistārī bhed batāviyā... °ṭek
Dhruv pāmyā Prabhunā dhāmne, teṇe tajyā kapaṭ chhal kāmne,
Jone odhav lomaṣh amar rahyā, muni mārkanḍa kāgbhushanḍī kahyā,
Bhajī Kṛuṣhṇa kalap bahu vītī gayā... Jaḍ° 2
Sanakādik Nārad saral mati, Prah‍lād Vibhīṣhaṇ jogī jati,
E to īshvar koṭimā bhaḷiyā, bhajī pragaṭ Prabhune thayā baḷiyā,
title: Jaḍbuddhi jīv po’chyānā parmāṇā

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-498: Sadguru Devanand Swami

Category: Updeshna Pad
